description.value:
Prerequisite: 11th level, Drow

Benefit: Your Lolthtouched racial trait normally lets you use either cloud of darkness or darkfire as an encounter power. You can use each power once per encounter.

Deletion (2/22/2011)

Removed second sentence of the feat to clarify text.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 138.
